revised_title: Differences in Physiological Effects of Poisons from Indian Venomous Snakes
tldr: The author examines the physiological effects of poisons from two species of Indian venomous snakes, the cobra and the viper, and identifies differences in their symptoms and effects on various animals and humans. The study aims to classify these poisons based on their physiological effects and provide insights into the mechanisms of snake venom on the human body.
